import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; const Home: React.FC = () => { const { isAuthenticated } = useAuth(); return (

Welcome to Blog App

Share your thoughts, stories, and ideas with the world. Create and manage your blog posts with ease.

{isAuthenticated ? (
Create Post
) : ( <>
Get started
Sign in
)}
); }; export default Home;
